title: Tropical Overwater Bungalow Escape in Tahiti
description: Enjoy an unforgettable escape in Tikehau - Tahiti's best-kept secret, and it's easier to get to than you might think. With weekly flights from Australia via New Zealand with Air Tahiti Nui you can be at Tikehau within five hours from Auckland airport.  Holiday in style in one of the gorgeous Overwater Bungalows at Tikehau Pearl Beach Resort, and enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, a welcome drink on arrival, one daily cocktail per person, a 50-minute couples' massage, incredible multi-course dining experiences and return boat transfers from Tikehau airport.
